issue.title: [C++] GcsFileSystem::Make should return Result
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16884](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16884). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For consistency with S3FileSystem and others. See discussion at https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13404#discussion_r901799543
